title: The Day Of The Triffids [1981]
description:
The Day Of The Triffids from the book by John Wyndham written in 1951. This is the BBC version from 1981, in my mind the best version, truest to the book.

I have ripped this from my own DVD copy and it comes in a smaller size than other versions available [without loss of quality] and with English subtitles.

Length - 26m ea approx
Size - 190mb ea approx
Frame Width - 572
Frame Height - 440
Container - MP4
Audio - MP3
Language - English
Subtitles - English
